Content: Trade nodes should be organized in a tree like structure if possible,
so they can be resolved in a tree. For resolution every node looks at
the demand of its subnodes and their supplies, the difference form its
demand and supply. Once the root is reached the actual transactions are
down down the tree. So essentially it is a series of local markets that

only trade with other sides if necessary.
